about.title: WHO WE ARE
about.description1: BEHEMOTH is an organization consists only of technicians.
about.description2: Writing software is not our only goal. We provide solutions from our technical point of view and grow together with our customers. Taking advantage of our members characteristics.

planning.title: PLANNING
planning.description: Understanding problems and planning solutions is what we are good at! Let us know what is in your mind.

technology.title: TECHNOLOGY
technology.description: We love technology! Our team contributes to many famous open source softwares. We believe that the evolution of technology would brings benefits to our customers.

take_care.title: TAKE CARE
take_care.description: All members in BEHEMOTH love writing software, but we care more about what we are solving with you.

introduction.summary: BEHEMOTH is an organization made up entirely of technicians. Our purpose is not only to develop software, but also to provide solutions from a technical standpoint and grow alongside our customers by leveraging our members' strengths.
introduction.planing_content: We pride ourselves in understanding customer's issues and devising tailored solutions. Let us know what keeps you awake at night, and we'll provide you with the exact solutions you need.
introduction.technology_content: We are fascinated by technology! Our team contributes to a number of well-known open source software projects. We believe that technological advancement will benefit our customers in the long run.
introduction.dedication_content: All BEHEMOTH members love developing software, but the right solutions along with unparalleled customer service are what we aim to offer.
